name: Nemo Cup Dating Simulator
description:
Have you ever wanted to date the Nemo Cup?? Well now you can!

- Go on 1 of 3 dates with the Nemo Cup!

- Multiple endings! Try and get the true ending...

- Story I think?

- Features the Nemo Cup (always a W if you ask me)

- Gender Neutral, you are the protagonist

NOTE: The Nemo Cup is over the age of 18. He's actually an infinite number of years old. He has transcended age. But he's legal, I promise!

There is also no NSFW content. Enjoy.
